name: Cauliflower with Browned Butter
ingredients: Frozen cauliflower or fresh cauliflower, cut into florets
utensils: Knife and cutting board (if using fresh cauliflower)

instructions.ja: カリフラワーを柔らかくなるまで調理する

instructions.en: Drain cauliflower and transfer to a bowl; keep warm
instructions.sk: Sceďte karfiol a preložte do misky; udržujte teplý
instructions.ja: カリフラワーの水気を切り、ボウルに移す。温かいままにしておく

instructions.en: In the same pot, melt butter over medium heat. Cook and stir constantly until it just begins to brown
instructions.sk: V tom istom hrnci roztopte maslo na strednom ohni. Varte a neustále miešajte, kým nezačne hnednúť
instructions.ja: 同じ鍋で、中火でバターを溶かす。きつね色になり始めるまで、絶えずかき混ぜながら調理する

instructions.en: Remove from heat immediately and pour browned butter over cauliflower
instructions.sk: Okamžite odstavte z ohňa a nalejte zhnednuté maslo na karfiol
instructions.ja: すぐに火から外し、きつね色のバターをカリフラワーにかける

instructions.en: Season with salt and optional nutmeg to taste
instructions.sk: Ochuťte soľou a voliteľne muškátovým orieškom podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 塩と必要に応じてナツメグで味を調える
